short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dodaj opcję 'Watch via Amazon Prime Video' po kliknięciu prawym przyciskiem myszy na obrazek.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch movies, TV, and sports, as well as recommendations just for you. Prime Video delivers exclusive Amazon Originals.

Enhance your browsing experience with the "Watch via Amazon Prime Video" Chrome extension. This extension adds a convenient context menu option to quickly view any image you find online on Amazon Prime Video. Simply right-click on an image, select "Watch via Amazon Prime Video," and you'll be instantly redirected to the Prime Video website.

Features:

Context Menu Integration: Right-click on any image and easily access the "Watch via Amazon Prime Video" option.
Quick Access to Prime Video: Instantly open Amazon Prime Video in a new tab and start watching your favorite content.
